name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm and gooey chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: New York Cheesecake
description: Classic New York-style cheesecake with a graham cracker crust and raspberry coulis.

name: Tiramisu
description: Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.

name: Fruit Salad
description: Fresh fruit salad with a variety of seasonal fruits and a honey-lime dressing.

name: Molten Caramel Pudding
description: Warm caramel pudding with a molten caramel center, drizzled with caramel sauce.
